title: Natural Remedy & Wellness Ecommerce Website
text: Questions Business Summary This ecommerce business was started in 2005 by a woman who suffered from acid reflux and found no help with traditional remedies. Someone suggested she try using calcium bentonite clay and within 2 days, her acid reflux disappeared. Purchased by the current owner in 2011, this business has a 10 year history online selling calcium bentonite clay products for external & internal use and even contains a line of products for pet health. Built on WordPress and CS Cart, the website has a clean and simple interface for shoppers and is extremely easy to administer. Visitors to the website can both learn about the history and health benefits of calcium bentonite clay as well as purchase the raw material and products made with it. The site also features an extensive testimonials library, newsletter sign-up and a customer loyalty/reference program. This business has extremely favorable gross & net profit margins and is a perfect opportunity for a home based business or an add-on to an existing e-commerce venture in the health or personal services niche.
